hymn.title: Lord, You are more precious than silver

layout.singingstanza: Lord, You are more pre -- cious than sil -- ver; Lord, You are more cost -- ly than gold; Lord, You are more beau -- ti -- ful than dia -- monds; And noth -- ing I de -- sire com -- pares with You.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, Your life is divine, eternal. Lord, Your life regenerated me. Lord, Your life is growing within me, Until I am fully conformed to Thee.
Lord, Your love is wide as the ocean. Lord, Your love is deep as the sea. Lord, Your love encompasses the nations, And that is all I want to live in me.
Lord, Your light is shining within us; Lord, Your light drives darkness away. Lord, Your light is guiding us onwards, Preparing us for the coming wedding day.
